EmailTemplate.name: TEST - Current Trial V2.test Day 03
EmailTemplate.subject: Make the most of your trial
EmailTemplate.textOnly: You have 11 days remaining on your free trial. Open your store by following these easy steps! It's time to add your first product It’s quick and easy to add products to your Bigcommerce store. Don’t have products yet? We’ll help you find some via our dropshipping <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/apps/dropshipping/]]> apps or our partnership with Alibaba.com <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/apps/alibabacom-wholesale/]]>. Add a product <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/login]]> Get ready to open your store for business {{my.LitmusToken}}
